instruction: Compose a theme song for a sitcom in the style of a 1960s pop song.
output:
Verse 1:
The laughter echoing down the halls
Memories everywhere, never getting old
Funny moments of life, moments to behold
This must be the place our sitcom calls

Chorus:
Our sitcom, our sitcom, good times be rolling
Our sitcom, our sitcom, come on let’s go in
Friends around the clock creating moments of joy
Never a dull moment, our sitcom’s here to deploy

Verse 2:
Too much joy, said nobody ever
No one wants happiness to sever
Life’s too short, to choose to never
Laugh and love, our sitcom’s here forever

Chorus:
Our sitcom, our sitcom, good times be rolling
Our sitcom, our sitcom, come on let’s go in
Friends around the clock creating moments of joy
Never a dull moment, our sitcom’s here to deploy
